Name: Mission in Snowdriftland - Snowlogue
About the game: Mission in Snowdriftland - Snowlogue is the free to play version of Mission in Snowdriftland. Play the first 3 levels for free. STORY Chaos at the headquarters of the video game organization, UPIXO: the villain, El Pix, has stolen some important and historically valuable artifacts of video game history from the archive. Help Chubby retrieve all the artifacts from El Pix's icy realm of Snowdriftland! GAME CONCEPT Mission in Snowdriftland is unique in its concept: Play it like a traditional Advent calendar, and select a level every day and let Chubby guide you through the cold winter days. Or play it like a classic platformer - any time you want. SUITABLE FOR ALL Mission in Snowdriftland offers the right gaming experience for all players: younger and less experienced gamers can get off to a quick and easy start and jump right in to start searching for the artifacts, while core gamers will face a cool challenge as they collect all 24 snowflakes per level. CRAZY WORLDS Prepare to confront some wacky opponents like brightly colored penguins and polar bear joggers listening to music! FEATURES 3 levels Pixel art Retro music Full controller support Speedrun timer Achievements Chubby is on another mission... will you join him?
